src:
Čudesna partija Tijane Bošković u derbiju pred 5.000 ljudi! Terzić i Brankica su morali da čestitaju...
Srpsko odbojkaško čudo nastavlja da oduševljava

02 Nov 2019

Name joj ravne!
Tijana Bošković je još jednom kada je bilo najpotrebnije pokazala da je najbolja odbojkašica na svetu.
U velikom turskom derbiju između Ezačibašija i Fenerbahčea, Boškovićeva je odigrala čudesnu partiju, osvojila neverovatnih 36 poena i donela pobedu svom timu posle dva sata i 11 minuta velike borbe - 3:2 (23:25, 26:24, 25:19, 21:25, 15:12). 



Ezačibaši je dočekao derbi sa pet pobeda iz isto toliko mečeva kao jedina neporažena ekipa u najjačoj ligi Evrope, dok je silno pojačanii Fener imao četiri pobede i poraz od Galatasaraja. Preko 5.000 navijača je večeras gledalo truski debi od čega su većina bile pristalice popularnijeg Fenerbahčea. I imali su razloga da se raduju na početku...
Ekipa Zorana Terzića je predvođena Brankicom Mihajlović i kubanskim čudom Melisom Vargas osvojila prvi set. Ali fenomenalna Tijana Bošković je sprečila Fener da potpuno preuzme kontrolu i blistala je u drugom setu koji je Ezačibaši dobio na razliku. U trećem setu je bila još bolja i donela preokret popularnim Tigricama, da bi Fenerbahče pokazao moć u četvrtom setu i uveo meč u tajbrejk.
A Tijana je navikla da bude najbolja kada se lomi. Bila je nezasuatvljiva u tajbrejku i donela pobeda Ezačibašiju. Na kraju je meč završila sa neverovatnih 36 osvojenih poena uz čak pet as servisa. Brazilska Natalija je dodala 15 poena. Na drugoj strani su Brankica Mihajlović i Melisa Vargas osvojile po 21 poena.  



(FOTO: EczacibasiSporKulubu)
text:
Wonderful party by Tijana Boskovic in the derby in front of 5,000 people! Terzic and Brankica had to congratulate ...
The Serbian volleyball miracle continues to delight

02 Nov 2019

They treat her to me!
Tijana Boskovic proved once again when she was most needed that she was the best volleyball player in the world.
In the big Turkish derby between Ezacibashi and Fenerbahce, Boskovic played a marvelous game, winning an incredible 36 points and winning his team after two hours and 11 minutes of big fight - 3: 2 (23:25, 26:24, 25:19, 21 : 25, 15:12).



Ezachibashi welcomed the derby with five wins from as many matches as the only undefeated squad in Europe's strongest league, with the heavily boosted Fener having four wins and a defeat by Galatasaray. Over 5,000 fans watched the Truss debut tonight, most of whom were supporters of the more popular Fenerbahce. And they had reason to rejoice at the beginning ...
Zoran Terzic's team was led by Brankica Mihajlovic and the Cuban marvel Melissa Vargas won the first set. But the phenomenal Tijana Boskovic prevented Fener from taking control completely and shone in the second set that Ezacibashi got the difference. In the third set, it was even better and brought a reversal to the popular Tigers, in order for Fenerbahce to show power in the fourth set and take the match into a tiebreaker.
And Tiana is used to being the best when she breaks. She was insatiable in the tabrek and brought victory to Ezachibashi. In the end, the match ended with an incredible 36 points and five aces of service. Brazil's Natalia added 15 points. On the other hand, Brankica Mihajlovic and Melisa Vargas scored 21 points each.



(PHOTO: EczacibasiSporKulubu)
